label: Fog of Mind
description: A sense of disorientation, uncertainty or foggy awareness.

label: Inner Alarm
description: Inner alertness, pressure, and tightness—like your system is on high alert.

label: Blocked Energy
description: Strong emotional energy without an outlet—tension, resistance, or irritation.

label: Emotional Weight
description: A feeling of heaviness, fatigue or loss—emotional exhaustion.

label: Distant State
description: A sense of being emotionally cut off, isolated or not present.

label: Centered & Aware
description: Grounded and peaceful with a sense of meaning or appreciation.

label: Lightness of Being
description: Ease, uplift and natural emotional flow—feeling light and present.
